thread.title: Gold Closes Lower as Stocks Swing

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Gold Closes Lower as Stocks Swing
text:
Gold prices fell for the third straight session Tuesday, as a stronger dollar limited gains in the safe-haven asset for much of the session despite continued volatility in the stock market.
Front-month Gold for February delivery closed down 0.5% at $1,326.10 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange. Prices have traded roughly sideways since hitting their highest level since August 2016 recently, with the dollar rebounding from multiyear lows. A stronger dollar makes gold and other commodities...
